file.name: smartapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: '1.0'
  title: CTD API
  description: The CTD API
  termsOfService: http://ctdbase.org/help/linking.jsp#batchqueries
  contact:
    name: CTD help desk
    x-role: responsible developer
    email: help@ctd.org
  x-translator:
    component: KP
    team:
      - Service Provider
servers:
- url: http://ctdbase.org/tools
  description: Production server
tags:
- name: translator
- name: ctd
paths:
  "/batchQuery.go":
    get:
      summary: retrieve relationship data
      parameters:
      - name: inputType
        in: query
        description: The Input type of query
        required: true
        example: chem
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: inputTerms
        in: query
        description: The Input value of query, usually a mesh ID
        required: true
        example: D003634
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: report
        in: query
        description: The Output of query
        required: true
        example: genes_curated
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: format
        in: query
        description: The output format
        required: true
        example: json
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: response object
      x-bte-kgs-operations:
      - "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-kgs-operations/gene2disease"
      - "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-kgs-operations/chemical2gene"
components:
  x-bte-kgs-operations:
    gene2disease:
    - inputs:
      - id: NCBIGene
        semantic: Gene
      predicate: related_to
      outputs:
      - id: MESH
        semantic: Disease
      source: CTD
      parameters:
        inputType: gene
        report: diseases_curated
        format: json
        inputTerms: "{inputs[0]}"
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/gene-disease"
    chemical2gene:
    - inputs:
      - id: MESH
        semantic: ChemicalSubstance
      predicate: related_to
      outputs:
      - id: NCBIGene
        semantic: Gene
      source: CTD
      parameters:
        inputType: chem
        report: genes_curated
        format: json
        inputTerms: "{inputs[0]}"
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/drug-gene"
  x-bte-response-mapping:
    gene-disease:
      MESH: data.DiseaseID
      name: data.DiseaseName
      pubmed: data.PubMedIDs
    drug-gene:
      NCBIGene: data.GeneId
      pubmed: data.PubMedIds
      inTaxon: data.OrganismId
